item.title: Let's Defend - PCAP Analysis
item.description: Description We captured this traffic from P13's computer so can you help him? Tools 1- Wireshark 2- OSINT Tools 3- Reverse engineering 4- Python scripting Writeup Q1 in this challenge I got a network traffic. so let’s openit and investigate that traffics. As we can see there are 25,262 packets so let’s filter the streams to TCP protocols and check if there is anything suspicious. Okay got 7780 stream so let’s check the whole stream and find something interesting.
